text: 'alam taelam -ayha alrswl- 'amr alyhwd aldhyn 'uetu hzzana min aleilm mimaa ja'ahum min altwrat, ystbdlwn aldalalat balhda, wytrkwn ma ladayhim min alhujaj walbrahyn, aldalt ealaa sidq risalatan alrasul muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, wytmnwn lakum -ayha almuminun almhtdwn- 'ana tnhrfu ean altariq almstqym; litakunuu daliyn mthlhm
